a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual number of scholarly publications on AI, by field of study
English-language scholarly publications related to the development and application of artificial intelligence. This
includes journal articles, conference papers, repository publications (such as arXiv), books, and theses.
Note: The reported number of publications in 2021 may be lower than the actual count due to lags in data collection.
Data source: Center for Security and Emerging Technology via AI Index Report (2022)
